alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 2:26AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills 45 to 55 below zero through Friday morning, then 20 to 30 below zero through Saturday morning. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph producing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Wind Chill Warning until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. Winter Weather Advisory until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of blowing snow significantly reducing visibility at times. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lowest wind chills will be at night with only minor improvement during the daytime.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
